description:
Simple, soft and stretchy, this light summer dress is patio ready and great for pulling on after a day at the beach. With its adjustable waistband, the Timeless Dress lets you customize the silhouette, from cinched to subtly tapered.

  • Light recycled polyester blend with spandex for comfortable stretch
  • Short sleeves for a comfortable t-shirt profile
  • 2 hand pockets and a stealthy zippered pocket on the right seam
  • Dropped hem
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
  • DWR finish keeps your dress looking better between washes and makes it dry even quicker
  • Regular fit wears just like you hoped it would
name: MEC Timeless Dress - Women's
